pr_title: BFD-211: Fix for broken AWS terraform provider >= 2.61.0

timeline.message: Roll back AWS terraform provider due to https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/issues/13236

timeline.bodyText:
I always try to leave this or a TODO so that these things can be found. In this case, I'd probably also throw a Jira ticket for it in the backlog and reference that ticket ID here.
